Public Service Announcement

Every subscription helps a stapler discover self-worth.

Mission Statement

Education, dignity, and fewer accidental invoices.

We believe every object, from anxious coat rack to overachieving blender lid, deserves literacy, lawful accounting, and a chance to contribute without being called "junk drawer material."

My backstory is simple: I was a bedside lamp in a motel off Route 8. I watched 11,000 people read half a novel then quit. I founded this nonprofit so unfinished things could finally finish something.

Volunteer Opportunities

Bring your skills. Leave with glitter and purpose.

  • Keyboard Shepherd (2 hrs/week): gently relocate cat using approved decoy mitten.
  • Grammar Coach: help vintage radios stop ending emails with "Regards???."
  • Snack Logistics: label all batteries "NOT SNACKS" in three languages.
  • Snow Globe Janitorial: polish interior glass without causing existential weather events.

Donate once: $12 funds one class period in "Boundaries for Blenders."
